org.switchyard.admin.mbean

Interface MessageMetricsMXBean

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BindingMXBean, ComponentReferenceMXBean, ComponentServiceMXBean, ReferenceMXBean

    public interface MessageMetricsMXBean
    Reports messaging metrics for entities in a SwitchYard domain : service, reference, runtime, etc.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getAverageProcessingTime()
      Average processing time for all messages in TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.
      int getFaultCount()
      Return the number of failed messages.
      int getMaxProcessingTime()
      Maximum processing time for a message in TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.
      int getMinProcessingTime()
      Minimum processing time for a message in TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.
      int getSuccessCount()
      Return the number of successful messages.
      int getTotalCount()
      Return the total number of messages processed.
      long getTotalProcessingTime()
      Total processing time for all messages in TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.
      void reset()
      Reset all collected metrics.

    • Method Detail

      • getSuccessCount

        int getSuccessCount()
        Return the number of successful messages.
        Returns:
        success count

      • getFaultCount

        int getFaultCount()
        Return the number of failed messages.
        Returns:
        fault count

      • getTotalCount

        int getTotalCount()
        Return the total number of messages processed. This is equivalent to getSuccessCount() + getFaultCount().
        Returns:
        total message count

      • getTotalProcessingTime

        long getTotalProcessingTime()
        Total processing time for all messages in TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.
        Returns:
        total processing time

      • getAverageProcessingTime

        double getAverageProcessingTime()
        Average processing time for all messages in TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.
        Returns:
        average processing time

      • getMinProcessingTime

        int getMinProcessingTime()
        Minimum processing time for a message in TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.
        Returns:
        min processing time

      • getMaxProcessingTime

        int getMaxProcessingTime()
        Maximum processing time for a message in TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.
        Returns:
        max processing time

      • reset

        void reset()
        Reset all collected metrics.
